title: I bought my mate RP for Christmas.
body: He cannot even redeem it due to him not being on the OCE server, it's funny how excited he got when the RP cards got there and then he couldn't use them, scumbag Riot.

replies.body: I have a debit card. You can't without a debit card, but most personal bank accounts have debit cards linked to them.

Well, on the back of the card it clearly states that it can only be activated in OCE...
There are currency differences and such, and not allowing that to be exploited doesn't really make Riot scumbags, just a normal business.
